name: Extreme Motor Boss
description:
Do you like bike race? Take your bike out because a real fun of riding is ready to begin. We present you this bike game to enjoy a series of ultimate racing mania. Bike games are total fun. Go on your bike racing. This game gives you a tremendous task of bike racing with completely new levels

Extreme Motor Boss Features:
- Enjoy real bike dragging on highway.
- Real HD graphics and elegant control.
- Enjoy smooth driving with ultimate bike stunts.
- Thrilling sound features and crazy effects.
- Get a real racing target with every level.
